slide.title: Redis: Lists
slide.example: 127.0.0.1:6379> LPUSH whisky "Glenfiddich 12" (integer) 1 127.0.0.1:6379> LPUSH whisky "Glenfiddich 10" (integer) 2 127.0.0.1:6379> RPUSH whisky "Ben Nevis 19" (integer) 3 127.0.0.1:6379> LRANGE whisky 0 -1 1) "Glenfiddich 10" 2) "Glenfiddich 12" 3) "Ben Nevis 19"
